title: The furniture rental company that's setting a new bar in high end interiors
text:
The concept of the value in ownership has lost a certain amount of currency of late. Whether it’s music, movies or prime property, it’s no longer necessary to possess something to get the best of it.

In many cases, the freedom of choice, the option of change and having less ‘stuff’ to your name have become more valuable than actually owning something outright.

The benefits of renting furniture are obvious - you get to enjoy a designer piece without the commitment. Rather than agonising over whether the investment of buying it is worth it, you can try it out and, if you get bored of it or move house, simply swap it for something else, guilt-free.

The online furniture and art rental company...
description: The concept of the value in ownership has lost a certain amount of currency of late.
